title: Clear day in a city, with the ego vehicle almost stopped at an intersection.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is almost stopped at the red light, waiting for the signal to turn green. The presence of parked cars and other moving vehicles requires the driver to be attentive and prepared to react to any sudden changes in the traffic situation.
